name: Elgato Facecam Pro
description: Professional 4K60 webcam with Sony sensor and adjustable field of view. Features uncompressed video output, professional color science, and XLR-level control.

reviews.review_text: 4K60 is overkill but downscales beautifully to 1080p.
Sony sensor makes low light usable finally.
Software is powerful but steep learning curve.
